description: This cluster is for assigning artifacts tags that are just below the level of strategic language, but above the terminology used at the tactical level of cybersecurity.  This cluster in particular aligns to terminology used to describe intentional or unintentional human activity as it relates to threats to cybersecurity.
name: HUMAN-THREAT
source: The HITRUST Threat Catalogue v1 and the ENISA Threat Taxonomy

values.description: Unintentional distribution of covered information to an unauthorized entity by an employee or employees.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Operational Framework: HITRUST TC LUH1 Data Sharing or Leakage
